https://level3.rest/patterns/list#list.description: The containing List for this Entry.

https://level3.rest/patterns/list#list-e.description: A resource element in this List resource. Each Entry is an individual resource.

https://level3.rest/patterns/list/editab.description: Adds an Entry to the List.
Action resource that will empty all the Entries from the List.
The List this Action will empty.
The List this resource will add an Entry to.

https://level3.rest/patterns/tree#top.description: The top node of the tree.

https://level3.rest/patterns/tree#child.description: A child node in the tree.

https://level3.rest/patterns/tree#parent.description: The parent node for this resource.

https://level3.rest/patterns/filter#filt.description: Configures the filtration of the collection.

https://level3.rest/patterns/sort#sorter.description: Configures the sorting of the collection.

https://level3.rest/patterns/page#next.description: The next page in a sequence of paged resources.

https://level3.rest/patterns/page#previo.description: The previous page in a sequence of paged resources.

https://level3.rest/patterns/page/offset.description: Describes the current page position and pagination configuration.
Describes and configures the pagination of this collection.

https://level3.rest/patterns/page/cursor.description: Describes the current cursor configuration and cursor mark.
Describes and configures the cursor configuration of this collection.

https://level3.rest/patterns/chooser#cho.description: A possible choice for a Chooser.
A selected choice in a Chooser.

https://level3.rest/patterns/stepper#inc.description: Increases the value of a Stepper resource. Link may contain an 'anchor' property pointing to the field being incremented.

https://level3.rest/patterns/stepper#dec.description: Decreases the value of a Stepper resource. Link may contain an 'anchor' property pointing to the field being decremented.

https://level3.rest/patterns/stepper#inc.description: The Stepper resource that will be incremented. Link may contain an 'anchor' property pointing to the field being incremented.

https://level3.rest/patterns/stepper#dec.description: The Stepper resource that will be decremented. Link may contain an 'anchor' property pointing to the field being decremented.

https://level3.rest/patterns/toggle#togg.description: Toggles a Toggler resource to it's opposite value. Link may contain an 'anchor' property pointing to the field being toggled.
The Toggler resource being toggled to an opposite value. Link may contain an 'anchor' property pointing to the field being toggled.

https://level3.rest/patterns/process#pro.description: The Process that orchestrates a set of Activities.

https://level3.rest/patterns/process#blo.description: The Process this Activity is currently blocking from moving forward.
An Activity that is currently blocking a Process from moving forward.

https://level3.rest/patterns/metadata#co.description: The Content resource described by this Metadata.
